name: Family Rescue Adventure
description:
Made by KKairos and tastyZounds for MetroidVania Month Jam #10. Detailed credits in included .txt.

How to play:

Z to jump. ENTER to change characters.
Up/down and pressing on wall to climb (with the correct character)
X to use the dash (with the right character.)

The game will track your progress at spawn points but there is no save between sessions at present, so you should finish in one sitting.
